column4: how do I get the KERNEL MAKEFILE ... while trying to make I get the error "Kernel Makefile not found at '/lib/modules/2.6.22-14-generic/source/"
I did the following: sudo apt-get build-dep linux-source-2.6.22                       apt-get source linux-source-2.6.22
not sure then, I haven't done a kernel compile in a couple of years
